functions.name: spotify_start_playback
functions.description: Plays music on Spotify - resumes current track if paused, or searches and plays specific songs, albums, or artists by name. Use when user wants to play/resume music, start a song, or play something by an artist.

type.description: [optional] type - the type of item to play. 'type' can be one or more of the following types: 'artist','album','track'. If multiple types are desired, pass in a comma separated string; e.g., 'track,album'.

name.description: [optional] name - the string of the name of album, track (song) or playlist. Everything enclosed in quotation marks denotes the name of the track, album or playlist. For example, in the query that asks 'Play 'Shake it Off' by Taylor Swift', the name is 'Shake it Off'.

artist.description: [optional] artist - the string of the name of the artist. Usually denoted by the word 'by' in a query. For example, in the query that asks 'Play 'Shake it Off' by Taylor Swift', the artist name is 'Taylor Swift'.

functions.name: spotify_pause_playback
functions.description: Pauses currently playing music on Spotify. Use when user wants to pause, stop, or halt music playback.

functions.name: spotify_next_track
functions.description: Skips to the next song in the queue. Use when user wants to skip this song, go to next track, or play the next song.

functions.name: spotify_previous_track
functions.description: Goes back to the previous song. Use when user wants to replay the last song, go back, or hear the previous track again.

functions.name: spotify_shuffle_playback
functions.description: Turns shuffle mode on or off for playback. Use when user wants to enable/disable random song order, shuffle their playlist, or turn shuffle on/off.

state.description: State in which shuffle should be set to. 'true' is to shuffle user's playback. 'false' is to not shuffle user's playback.

functions.name: spotify_set_volume
functions.description: Adjusts Spotify playback volume to a specific level (0-100%). Use when user wants to change music volume, make it louder/quieter, or set volume to a percentage.

volume_percent.description: The volume to set. Must be a value from 0 to 100 inclusive.

functions.name: spotify_get_currently_playing
functions.description: Shows what song is currently playing on Spotify, including track name, artist, and album. Use when user asks what's playing, what song is this, or who's the artist.

functions.name: spotify_queue_track
functions.description: Adds a song, album, or artist to the playback queue to play next or later. Use when user wants to queue a song, add to queue, play something after current track, or line up music.

type.description: [optional] type - the types of item to queue. One or more of 'artist','album','track'. If multiple types are desired, pass in a comma separated string; e.g., 'track,album'.

name.description: [optional] name - the string of the name of album, track or playlist

artist.description: [optional] artist - the string of the name of the artist

functions.name: spotify_get_user_playlists
functions.description: Lists user's Spotify playlists (top 10 or custom limit). Use when user asks to show/list their playlists, see their music collections, or browse their saved playlists.

limit.description: [optional] limit - the number of playlists to return. The default limit is 10.
